backend/main.mo: Motoko actor that processes user input, analyzes common grammar mistakes (e.g., 'goed', 'gonna'), generates correction feedback, and maintains a conversation log of turns with user input, robot responses, and optional corrections.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting five implemented features: child-friendly robot interface, voice input, correction feedback display, conversation flow, and playful educational design theme with associated files and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-formatted summaries of all frontend source files describing components, hooks, and configuration for the robot tutor interface.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS base styles with custom CSS variables for light and dark themes using OKLCH color space, defining design tokens for backgrounds, borders, and UI elements.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point that loads the React application with title 'English Robot Tutor' and mounts to root div.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component orchestrating the robot tutor UI with robot character, voice input, and conversation history in a gradient-styled layout with header and footer.
frontend/src/components/ConversationHist: Scrollable conversation display component showing user messages, robot responses, and correction feedback in colored chat bubbles with loading states.
frontend/src/components/CorrectionFeedba: Component displaying grammar corrections in a yellow-highlighted box with lightbulb icon for encouraging learning feedback.
frontend/src/components/RobotCharacter.t: Animated robot character component with state-based visual feedback (idle, listening, speaking) using dynamic gradients, bounce animations, and status messages.
frontend/src/components/VoiceInput.tsx: Voice input component with large microphone button using speech recognition hook, displaying recording status, transcripts, and browser compatibility warnings.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom React hook that manages the backend actor instance, creating authenticated or anonymous actors based on Internet Identity state and invalidating dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useConversation.ts: React hook that manages conversation state and interactions, providing methods to send messages to the backend actor and retrieve conversation logs using React Query.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Comprehensive Internet Identity authentication provider and hook that manages user login/logout state, identity persistence, and AuthClient configuration for ICP authentication.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Simple React Query hook that fetches conversation log data from the backend actor when available.
Custom hook that wraps the browser's Web Speech Recognition API to provide voice input functionality with transcript capture, listening state management, and error handling.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables defining a comprehensive design system including light/dark mode color schemes, spacing, and animation utilities.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query client and Internet Identity provider, then renders the root App component.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending the default theme with custom colors using OKLCH color space, animations, typography, and container query plugins.
project_state.json: Project metadata defining an English learning app for children with AI robot tutor, tracking implemented features like voice input and conversation flow, and pending features like grammar correction backend logic.
